commitResults.messageTitle: Add greeting and exit messages
Extract message formatting to functions
Extract print formatting to BunnySession class Rename bot to Bunny
Implement user command echoing

Wrote a basic REPL which takes input and prints it out
Scans for input equalling “bye” to signal a quit

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement adding and printing to a list of items
commitResults.messageBody:
Created a Todo class to encapsulate the data of a Todo element
BunnySession stores an ArrayList of Todos
Updated the REPL to handle the list command

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement marking and unmarking TODOs as done
commitResults.messageBody:
Override toString() for Todo class
Add markAsDone and markAsNotDone  to Todo class

Add mark and unmark handlers to REPL

commitResults.messageTitle: Format code to follow SE-EDU standards

Added spacing
Renamed constants to follow screaming snake case

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract command parsing responsibility to a separate class
Refractor Todo to inherit from new abstract class Task
Refractor to move "done" functionality to the Task class.
Implement Deadline and Event types of Task.
Create test case for text-based testing
Refractor code to delegate command validation to separate classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Move all code to the com.ethanyidong.bunny package
Create ArgumentValidator and CommandValidator interfaces
Implement PositionalArgumentCommandValidator and FlagArgumentCommandValidator
Implement IntegerArgumentValidator, TaskIndexArgumentValidator, and NotEmptyArgumentValidator
Make commands an enum instead of a String
Implement per-command validation setup

TODO: Fix regression in which specific errors are no longer reported (e.x. "should be a number")

commitResults.messageTitle: Provide helpful messages for invalid commands
commitResults.messageBody: Refractor Validators to throw errors for invalid inputs instead of returning false

Updated tests to reflect this change
Fixed issue with Windows testing

commitResults.messageTitle: Refractor to separate command functionality into different classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Create ExecutableCommand class
Rename ParsedCommand to TokenizedCommand for clarity
Shifted validation, parsing, and execution responsibilities to the ExecutableCommand class and its respective children

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement recognizing and formatting ISO dates
commitResults.messageBody:
Create FlexibleDate class to represent dates which may or may not be formatted
Update Deadline and Event classes to use FlexibleDate instead of String to store dates
Update test to test formatted dates

Ran IntelliJ autoformatting on all code
Rename variables to align with coding standards
Extract output strings and output errors to constant format strings in UI class

commitResults.messageTitle: Continue running if writing to save file fails
Change file storage to be relative to JAR file
Fix bug where a command with positional argument / would crash the program Fix bug where state is not saved if the buffer is not flushed
Swap saving and running commands to prevent unusable states in the presense of bugs
